title: EcoAI: Virtual AI Assistant
description: EcoAI is an ad-supported, multi-LLM chat app offering top models like GPT-4o, Claude 3.5, Meta-Llama 3.1 (8B/70B/405B), Mistral, and Gemma-2. Plus, it’s powered by DALL·E 3 for image generation. Enjoy real performance with no compromise, all at no cost!
